trans-unit.source: Provides common methods and properties for composite activity designers that contain structured layouts.

> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner is the base class for all designers that contain child designers and the child designers are connected to each other using lines rendered on the design surface, called connectors.

The class is provided so that activity designer developers can provide a number of activity designer layout types, rather than being tied to the layout provided in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> class.
When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> class.

Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView"></xref> that contains information about the current designer view displayed by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
ActiveView contains the view ID and any text, images, activity designers, and user data associated with the view.

A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView"></xref> that contains information about the current view displayed by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.

Returns a value that indicates whether the specified activities can be added to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> at the specified location on the workflow design surface.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref> that contains the screen location at which to attempt to insert the activities.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> read-only collection that contains the activities to add.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified activities can be inserted at the specified location on the workflow design surface; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns a value that indicates whether the specified activities can be removed from the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> read-only collection that contains the activities to remove.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified activities can be removed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a generic read-only collection that contains all activity designers that are children of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> read-only collection that contains the child designers.
Gets or sets the index of the current drop target in the array of drop targets returned by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.GetDropTargets*>.
An integer that represents the index of the current drop target for the designer.
Draws all of the connectors to display on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
Connectors are links between separate designers on a workflow design surface.
These links appear as lines on the design surface and each line end connects to a visible point on the designers it connects.
These points are called connection points.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> on which to draw the connectors.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> to draw the connectors.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> array that contains the endpoints for each of the connectors to draw.
A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor"></xref> that determines the graphic to draw at connector start points.
A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor"></xref> that determines the graphic to draw at connector end points.
Ensures that the specified activity designer is visible on the workflow design surface.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> for which to ensure visibility on the workflow design surface.
Gets the first selectable object in the navigation order of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.

FirstSelectableObject returns the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView.AssociatedDesigner%2A> property that is exposed through <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.ActiveView%2A>.
An <xref:System.Object> that is the first selectable object in the designer navigation order.
Returns an array of valid drop locations on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> surface.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> to query the design surface with.

A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> array that represents the valid drop locations on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> surface.
Returns a read-only collection of points that represent the inner connection points for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
Connectors are links between separate designers on a workflow design surface.
These links appear as lines on the design surface and each line end connects to a visible point on each designer it connects.
These points are called connection points.

Designer classes that inherit from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner> class can contain other designers, and GetInnerConnections returns a read-only collection of all the connection points for the designers associated with `edges` that are contained by the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner>.
The DesignerEdges along which to search for connection points.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> generic read-only collection that contains the inner connection points for the designer.

Returns the first selectable object that follows the specified object in the navigation order for the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
The current object in the navigation order.
A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection"></xref> that determines the navigation order of the designer.
The first selectable that follows the obj parameter in the navigation order.
Initializes the designer by using the specified activity.
Initialize ensures that the active view loaded into the workflow design surface is a valid view.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> with which to initialize the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
Adds the specified activities to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> at the specified location on the workflow design surface.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref> that specifies the location to add the activities.

The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> read-only collection that contains the activities to add to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
Gets the last selectable object in the navigation order of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner> is the active activity designer, LastSelectableObject returns `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
If a child activity designer is the active designer, it returns the last selectable object associated with the active child designer.
The <xref:System.Object> that is the last selectable object in the designer navigation order.
Loads the view state of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> from a binary stream.
A <xref:System.IO.BinaryReader> used to restore the designer view state.
reader contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
Gets the minimum size settings for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the smallest possible size for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
Moves the specified activities from one designer displayed in the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> to another.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref> that contains the location on the workflow design surface to move the activities.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> read-only collection to move.
Notifies the designer when the activity associated with it changes.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityChangedEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the changed activity.
e is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> when more than one of the activities it contains has changed.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the activities that changed.
Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> when a drag-drop operation is completed with the bounds of its design surface.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"></xref> that defines the operation event arguments.
e contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).

Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> when a drag-drop operation is in progress and the user's mouse cursor enters the bounds of the designer.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"></xref> that defines the operation event arguments.
e contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).

Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> when a drag-drop operation is in progress and the user's mouse cursor leaves the bounds of the designer.

Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> when a drag-drop operation is in progress and the user's mouse cursor is inside the bounds of the designer.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"></xref> that defines the operation event arguments.
e contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
Performs layout tasks to position visual cues and child designers on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"></xref> that contains the layout arguments.
e contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).

Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> when the size of the visual cues on the designers displayed by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> have changed.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"></xref> that contains the layout arguments.

The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the new size of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> on the workflow design surface.
Displays the designer verbs associated with a smart tag at a specified location on the workflow design surface.

The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that represents the location on the workflow design surface for which to show <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"></xref> objects.
Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> when the current designer view changes.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView"></xref> that is to be set.
Stores the current view state of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> to a binary stream.
The <xref:System.IO.BinaryWriter> to which the current designer view state is stored.
Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> displays smart tags.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the designer displays smart tags; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a read-only collection of designer actions that are associated with the smart tags on the designer.
The collection is returned only if the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner> hosts multiple views.
Use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.Views%2A> property to determine how many views the current designer hosts.
A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"></xref> read-only collection that contains all the actions associated with the smart tags on the designer.
Get a read-only collection of designer views that the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> hosts.

The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView"></xref> read-only collection that contains the views hosted by the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
